Class AngleRuler

java.lang.Object
org.opensourcephysics.cabrillo.tracker.Ruler
org.opensourcephysics.cabrillo.tracker.AngleRuler
public class AngleRuler extends Ruler
This draws ruled angle lines and labels for a Protractor.
Author:
Douglas Brown
